1010111011001100 1110110011011010 1 -> sum: 1001101110100111, cout: 1

0011001011000111 1110010011111001 1 -> sum: 0001011111000001, cout: 1
0011011110110101 1010001101010000 1 -> sum: 1101101100000110, cout: 0
0010011101000111 1010110011010110 0 -> sum: 1101010000011101, cout: 0
